attributes.action: higher the voting age and drinking Alcohol age in the uk to 21
attributes.background: too many children are getting drunk and becoming an  alcoholic and out of control in the streets. in the usa it is 21 and works there, you do not know your own mind until 21 so how would a child know how to vote.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242010

You could start a new petition about raising the voting age to 21 if that's what you want to see happen.
